review_data.title: A shopping center.
review_data.content: If you are used to shopping in London or Paris, you'll not be very amazed. It is one of Switzerland's biggest shopping centers but not too exciting anyways. Good for a gift or a new shirt. The food hall is very nice though.

review_data.title: Something for everyone...
